data.title: Mapping geographical inequalities in oral rehydration therapy coverage in low-income and middle-income countries, 2000–17
data.meta_description: Oral rehydration solution (ORS) is a form of oral rehydration therapy (ORT) for diarrhoea that has the potential to drastically reduce child mortality; yet, according to UNICEF estimates, less than half of children younger than 5 years with diarrhoea ...
